questionTitle: He doesn't work now. He's ________ 65.
Please hurry or you will be late ________ school.
The cow had lost its own calf, but the farmer persuaded it to ________ one whose mother had died .
What's wrong with John? He ________ used to be so sad .
I'm afraid I've got ________ my bank as soon as possible.
Tomorrow he will come ________ home late.
Ouch! I ________ my thumb!
By then I ________ my driving test, I hope.
I hadn't expected James to apologize but I had hoped ________.
Our host family always invites my roommate and ________ to their house on Sundays.
He was dealt such a severe blow ________ stunned for several minutes.
You will become ill ________ you stop working so hard .
I don't think that red dress ________ her.
Take this road and you will ________ at the hotel in five minutes.
Could you please tell me if you have any electric typewriters ________?
I wouldn't believe what she says. She sounds very convincing but she's just a fast ________.
Mr Johnson, candidate for governor, was eulogized for his ________.
anwers: strength and also what he did

questionTitle: Don't touch that wire or you may get an electric ________.
A person who says things that are not true is a ________.
No matter how hard I tried, he kept on ________.
